name: All Systems Online
description:
A sandbox space battle game where you dynamically build your own ships that revolves around an energy system. You'll find yourself constantly running out of power in the beginning, as you use it to move and to power your weapons, but as you go on, you can overcome the enemy onslaught.

This was a game made for Ludum Dare 39. The theme was Running out of Power.

---Instructions (in-game too)---

WSQE  for Movement

Hold left mouse to shoot

Space to switch between building and fighting

----------------------------------------------------------------------

UPDATES TO POST-JAM VERSION

-More floaty movement!

-Updated graphics!

-Sounds! Music!
